body_html:
@epiception I met the same error. I just put the snippet with tf.control_dependencies()... within while_loop code section and the error disappeared.
I not quite understand the concept of frame and why

the problem with your program is that slim.batch_norm() is created in the loop body so the update_ops of batch_norm can't be used outside of the loop. (We don't allow a control edge from an op inside the loop body to an op outside the loop.)

@yuanbyu Could you explain it more? thanks.
